attributes.description:
The new Peugeot 2008 1.2T Active A/T SUV features a recessed windscreen highlighting its lean and athletic shape. Its wide black grille with chrome-plated trim and its Full LED headlights with 3 claws, surrounded by a thin strip of daytime running lights, emphasize the modernity of its feline look.
It comes with a 3 year or 100 000kms warranty and a 3 year or 60 000kms service plan. Test drives are available, Trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
